summary: This document consists of email exchanges regarding a title examination for a property transaction involving Granite Realty, LLC and Richard Yospin, Trustee of The Richard Yospin Family Trust. The emails discuss scheduling and the request for a full title examination to be completed by November 26, 2019.

persons.name: Richard Yospin
persons.context: Richard Yospin is mentioned as the Trustee of The Richard Yospin Family Trust involved in a property transaction.

connections.description: Richard Yospin is the seller in the property transaction with Granite Realty, LLC.

events.title: Deadline for Title Examination
events.description: A full title examination is requested to be completed by the end of the day.

keyFacts: The email correspondence involves a request for a full title examination related to a property transaction.
Richard Yospin is identified as the Trustee of The Richard Yospin Family Trust.
The requested completion date for the title examination is November 26, 2019.
Granite Realty, LLC is the buyer in the transaction.
The emails express a friendly tone and discuss scheduling a meeting over coffee.
